metadata.title: CVE-2019-14465 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
fmt_mtm_load_song in fmt/mtm.c in Schism Tracker 20190722 has a heap-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14465` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

schism - 2:20190805-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: schism package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:20190805-1').
